Walker is a well renowned mancunian doorman who frequently poses as a jew, despite the fact that his Wesi-Indian complexion is a blatant give away. He pounces on unsuspecting dead punters and ravishes them. Unwilling participators in his necrophilic acts are beaten to a pulp and mixed with the Kenyamacan delicacy, a Brandy substitute called Shoaiba and drunk whilst partaking in beastial necrophilic acts. So help me god!
+
Walker is a well renowned mancunian doorman who frequently poses as a jew, despite the fact that his West-Indian complexion is a blatant give away. He pounces on unsuspecting dead punters and ravishes them. Unwilling participators in his necrophilic acts are beaten to a pulp and mixed with the Kenyamacan delicacy, a Brandy substitute called Shoaiba and drunk whilst partaking in beastial necrophilic acts. So help me god!
  +
===Serial killers===
===Serial killers===
Necrophilia has also been a motive for some [[serial killer]]s, including murderers [[Ed Gein]], [[Richard Chase]], [[Winston Moseley]], [[John Reginald Halliday Christie]], [[Bruno LÃ¼dke]], [[Jerry Brudos]], [[Ted Bundy]], and [[Jeffrey Dahmer]], who ate his victims after killing them; the technical term for this particular variant activity is [[necrophagia]]. Several other [[murder]]ers have described drawing sexual excitement from killing, as well, such as [[Karla Faye Tucker]], who claimed to have an [[orgasm]] with each swing of the [[axe]] she used to kill [[Jerry Lynn Dean]]. The guilty-plea testimony provided by the recently captured ([[2005]]) serial killer [[Dennis Rader]] provided a rare public glimpse into the workings of such a controlling mind.
